Title: Metro Flash Cards
Description: Create your own Flash Cards on Windows 8 for fun. I used it to help me and my wife learn German. It's written using HTML5 and JavaScript.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Create your own Flash Cards on Windows 8 for fun. I used it to help me and my wife learn German. It's written using HTML5 and JavaScript.

For more information, please visit my blog post here:
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/balsharfi/archive/2012/04/29/building-the-metro-flash-cards-app.aspx to find out how I built the app.
